original_text: You will plant vineyards to grow grapes. You will take care of the plants. But you will not drink any wine or bring in any grapes. Instead, worms will eat them.
korean_text: 네가 포도원을 심고 가꿀지라도 벌레가 먹으므로 포도를 따지 못하고 포도주를 마시지 못할 것이며

sentences.original_text: You will plant vineyards to grow grapes.
sentences.korean_translation: 포도를 재배하기 위해 포도원을 심을 것이다.

sentences.original_text: You will take care of the plants.
But you will not drink any wine
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 어떤 포도주도 마시지 못할 것이다
